snippet: What do Asians and Europeans have in common apart from a shared love of soccer. Well, a lot of history for a start, and plenty of scope to learn from each other. But is an inward-looking Europe missing out by sticking with outdated attitudes?
abstract: What do Asians and Europeans have in common apart from a shared love of soccer. Well, a lot of history for a start, and plenty of scope to learn from each other. But is an inward-looking Europe missing out by sticking with outdated attitudes?

headline.main: Does Europe's Arrogance Blind it to Asia?
